Into The Distant Sky

See the night sky beyond the limits of your eyes...

Closer to us

Farther away

A map of the Universe

This is a map showing what astronomers see in the sky. We are located at the bottom. The top shows the edge of the observable Universe where the first flash of light, the cosmic microwave background, was emitted 13.7 billion years ago. In between, astronomers have detected millions of galaxies and quasars.

Click on the image for more Information.
